tool_description: Create frequency based word clouds out of any text using part of speech filters. Let the cloud summarise what is going on in the text. The api supports Russian currently. Let us know if you need other languages via the API support.
name: SemanticCloud
title: SemanticCloud

api_list.name: text cloud
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dmitrykey-semanticcloud-v1.p.rapidapi.com/semcloud/v2/wordscloud/text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dmitrykey-semanticcloud-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
